availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry J. Fuquay (Washington, Arkansas, farmer and Hopkins County, KY, petition signer. )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, resident. Arkansas native. Son of Thomas W. Fuquay and Delia Fuquay. Farmer in Washington, Arkansas, in 1850. Resident in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Sevier County, Washington, p. 221A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, Dixon, p. 202B.
"Henry Joseph Fuquay (1832-1887)," Find A Grave, Memorial #41660969, accessed October 19, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41660969.
KYR-0001-020-0100.
